title: Blended Learning-Based Advanced Mathematics Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: College-level foundational mathematics knowledge and practical experience in professional fields
context.additional_context: Asynchronous blended learning environment optimized for smartphone-based learning, requiring flexible design considering professionals' work schedules

learning_goals: Learners can plan and execute self-directed learning sessions of at least 60 minutes, three or more times per week
Learners can engage in meaningful academic exchanges with peers and instructors at least twice monthly using synchronous/asynchronous interaction tools
Learners can apply advanced mathematical concepts to real-world work scenarios through module-specific competency assessments (scoring 80% or higher)
Learners can achieve target competencies within 12 weeks by combining system-recommended learning pathways with self-selected learning activities

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
